idea:
i. To carry on the business of consultants and advisors (in India and

overseas) to individuals, firms, commercial enterprises, companies,

corporations, government, semi-government, local social or other

organizations on technical, industrial, commercial, marketing,

financial, legal, direct and indirect taxation and other levies,

costing, accounting, etc.

ii. To act as Business Management Consultants, Financial

Consultants, Tax Consultants, Financial Advisors.

iii. To provide services of Accounting, Bookkeeping, preparing and

maintaining financial records, Filing of various returns with the

concerned authorities.

iv. Other ancillary business/activities or any other business in any

other manner as may be decided by the majority of Partners.
name: IMPOSTO MANAGEMENT LLP

idea:
1. We are commercial loan broker.


2. Business owners & entrepreneurs looking for financial aid/loans have to follow a lengthy and tedious protocol. This is where we come into the picture. We assist you in securing financial aid/loan without hassle.


3. Generally, small business owners who choose to work with a commercial loan brokers do so to save time, energy, and the hassle of exploring and applying to different financing products on their own.


4. As a commercial loan broker we shall collect relevant information about your business and submit applications on your behalf to potential business lenders for a price, of course.


5. We will charge you only if you successfully secure a loan.
name: FUNDDIT LLP
